Welcome to The Vet Kennel 🐾

Your cosy corner in the vast world of veterinary medicine.

Currently home to my frantic NAVLE revision along with documented evidence of me slowly losing my mind during the process.

Have a sniff around my website and if you come across some fleas... let's just keep that between us hey?
